content: With the Loong Balm equipped, each sip of your Gourds recovers 30% of Maximum Health. At the same time, each sip considerably increases damage executed by the next attack. This makes the Drink one of the most powerful, especially if you can pair it with a strong Soak and Gourd too.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Balm.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Balm'.
The content is as follows:
With the Loong Balm equipped, each sip of your Gourds recovers 30% of Maximum Health. At the same time, each sip considerably increases damage executed by the next attack. This makes the Drink one of the most powerful, especially if you can pair it with a strong Soak and Gourd too.
